categories: Category:Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi

nodes.text: Star Wars: Build a Droid - Sticker Activity Book (Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi)

Star Wars: Build a Droid - Sticker Activity Book is an activity book that will be released on December 1, 2017 as part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi in Australia by an Egmont UK Ltd subsidiary, Hardie Grant Egmont.
Learn about your favourite droids from the Star Wars saga, while discovering a few new droids from Star Wars: The Last Jedi in this fun sticker activity book.
